seed_pair.english: Will they be able to drive us home after the meal?
seed_pair.mandarin: 他们能在饭后开车送我们回家吗？

recent_seed_pairs.english: They wanted to raise as much as possible for charity.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们想为慈善筹集尽可能多的钱。

recent_seed_pairs.english: They didn't want to decide what he should do.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们不想决定他应该做什么。

recent_seed_pairs.english: They want to travel while they're still young.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们想在他们还年轻的时候旅行。

recent_seed_pairs.english: Did they want to develop a new approach?
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们想开发一个新方法吗？

recent_seed_pairs.english: No they wanted to keep doing it the same way.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 不，他们想继续用同样的方法做。

recent_seed_pairs.english: Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 是的，他们觉得可以更有效地做。

recent_seed_pairs.english: They will be able to carry that suitcase.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们会能够拿那个行李箱。

recent_seed_pairs.english: They won't be able to break that window.
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: 他们不会能够打破那个窗户。

_instructions.vocabulary_sources: 10 recent seed pairs + 30 recent NEW LEGOs + current seed's earlier LEGOs + current LEGO
